item.title: Christmas List
item.description: Keep in mind that anything underlined is a clickable link. With that out of the way, here’s my Christmas list: iFixit Pro Tech Toolkit (from Amazon) [$70] Genesis Lockpick Set (from covertinstruments.com, quite the name, right?) [$25 + shipping] GamersNexus merch of any type, I have one of their shirts in large (from their website) Gift cards from Steam, or MOD And of course, other stuff that I haven’t thought of yet.
item.content:
Keep in mind that anything underlined is a clickable link. With that out of the way, here’s my Christmas list:

  • iFixit Pro Tech Toolkit (from Amazon) [$70]

  • Genesis Lockpick Set (from covertinstruments.com, quite the name, right?) [$25 + shipping]

  • GamersNexus merch of any type, I have one of their shirts in large (from their website)

  • Gift cards from Steam, or MOD

  • And of course, other stuff that I haven’t thought of yet.
